QueryCursor¶

Contents:

  • QueryRow
class QueryCursor¶

A cursor that handles multiple channels in a single query.

Public Functions

QueryCursor()¶

Constructs a QueryCursor.

Warning

QueryCursors should be created from History::Query and not directly created in end-user code.

QueryRow GetRow()¶

Gets the values of the current row.

Return

A QueryRow for the current row

int Next()¶

Moves to the next record.

Return

Successful if the result is > 0. Returns CURSOR_OK, CURSOR_PRE or CURSOR_POST on success or CURSOR_END on failure/end of file.

bool EoF()¶

Checks if the cursor is at the end.

Return

Returns true if at the end of the results, otherwise false.
